meanings.sent1: She yirked when the door slammed shut.
meanings.sent2: The cat would yirk awake at the sound of thunder.
meanings.sent3: The clown's yirking dance made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The car engine yirked to life after sitting idle for months.
meanings.sent5: The sudden yirk of the train made the passengers grab onto the handrails.

meanings.sent1: His yirk startled the birds perched on the fence.
meanings.sent2: The yirk of the earthquake knocked over the vase.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected yirk of the rollercoaster made her scream with delight.
meanings.sent4: The yirk of the fishing line signaled a big catch.
meanings.sent5: The yirk of the dancer's body captivated the audience.
